name: Thickness planner
description: The wood surface planer or better-known as thickness planer is one of the popular wood workshop machines

name: Bandsaw
description: This band fits over two or more rotating wheels which are driven by powerful electric motors.

name: Wood Router
description: This handheld power tool provides us the capability to be hollow out sections in any wood workpiece and any other materials.

name: Chisel Mortiser
description: The chisel mortisers are one of the very important and versatile wood working machine tools which are used for drilling up holes into wooden surfaces.

name: Tenoning Machine
description: The tenoning machine is typically used to craft out those tenons.

name: Nail Gun
description: A nail gun, or sometimes known as a nailer, gives us the capability to drive nails into wood and other materials.
